channel.title: My First Model
channel.description:
I just created my first model using primitives (I'll have you know, it's not good at all). All I can hope for is some constructive criticism. I'm not asking you to give me your opinion on whether you like it or not (because it's very likely you won't), I'm only asking for your support. I tried to have fun with this, too.
[IMG]http://i771.photobucket.com/albums/xx351/the-soul1/sword1-1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i771.photobucket.com/albums/xx351/the-soul1/sword2-1.jpg[/img]
I also forgot to mention that I didn't look at any tutorials; this was all done by me.

item.title: My First Model
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

The Soul:

I didn’t use anything besides the primitive tool, move, rotation, scale, or mat, IIRC.

Eeh, i wasnt saying the model was simple or nutin, i was just saying its not that impressive for a first, without tuts. Since i never had a tut on my first model either. It can be impressive to someone else, but for me, I just dont think so =p No biggy, who doesnt improve over time?

Read full topic

I didn’t use anything besides the primitive tool, move, rotation, scale, or mat, IIRC.

item.title: My First Model
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Eeh, have you seen my Theif’s scimitar? I did that without tuts or such, mainly because at the time i was a lazy bastard who didnt like to read things over 1 paragraph. To be honest, i never really read any tuts past the BASIC peices of just tool usage.

Read full topic

item.title: My First Model
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“Graffle, post:15, topic:323523”]I replied back in like 5 minutes, so if you made that model in 5 minutes, it could have been alot better.

EDIT - Just noticed, why was this posted over an hour later then.[/quote]

I sent you the message at 8:11, and you replied at 8:40. By that time I was already working on the model. Anyways, that is beside the fact that I didn’t look at any tutorials.

Read full topic

item.title: My First Model
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:3, topic:323523”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=419928.msg3084503#msg3084503 date=1262404843]
Hmm, i like it, but just a little tip (for alignment) keep make Primitives at the same Y-axis level. No offense but i never pictured you wanting to make models, or every seen you make a model. Soo, while im ahead. Ty for choosing primitives to start out.
[/quote]

I just wanted to take a bit of time off of programming for a while and try something new. And about the alignment: I didn’t even think about that. Thanks.[/quote]

NP, its just a tip, its your first though, and working with Primitives is a little bit more challenging until you figure it out. Have you seen both of my tuts? They should help ya a bit.

Read full topic

I just wanted to take a bit of time off of programming for a while and try something new. And about the alignment: I didn’t even think about that. Thanks.
